subject: change your life be healthy
body:
A torn jacket is soon mended but hard words bruise the heart of a child.
Prospect is often better than possession.
Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
That which makes people dissatisfied with their condition, is the chimerical idea they form of the happiness of others.
The average estimate themselves by what they do, the above average by what they are.
A wounded deer leaps the highest.
Adversity has the same effect on a man that severe training has on the pugilist -- it reduces him to his fighting weight.
The principle of the Gothic architecture is infinity made imaginable.
Some couples go over their budgets very carefully every month. Others just go over them.
We may draw good out of evil we must not do evil, that good may come.
The facts of a person's life will, like murder, come out.
My appointed work is to awaken the divine nature that is within.
Life is 10 percent what you make it and 90 percent how you take it.
Good breeding, a union of kindness and independence.
The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
The worth of a book is to be measured by what you can carry away from it.
When you can think of yesterday without regret and tomorrow without fear, you are near contentment.
HELP  H(umor), E-go, edging God out, L-istening, P-urpose
With renunciation life begins.
